name: Wild West: Steampunk Alliances
description:
Fans of Red Dead Redemption prepare! This strategy game is made for you! Steam and dust will cover this wild west world soon. Survive the red dead desert now.

◈ Enjoy the strategy game #1
◈ Form your steampunk alliances!
◈ Serve and protect your hive!
◈ Craft steampunk factories!
◈ Research and develop powerful weapons!
◈ Mine exclusive raw materials!
◈ Send your drones to war and crusade against hostile machines!
◈ Destroy your rivals!

【Gunfighters Unite】
Only the strong will survive. Unite with your local gunfighters and ally against the machines. Form your alliances and join forces for the epic battle of the wild west. Strategy and resources are fundamental, but without allied troops your empire will fall soon. Form invincible alliances and destroy your rivals. Or do you cheat on your allies and friendly-fire ´em?

【Steampunk Factories】
Steampunk technology is all around. Research and develop powerful weapons with the help of futuristic factories. Mine the needed raw materials and grow your production facilities to the maximum. Equip your gunfighters with weapons. Only armed troops will survive the battle of the wild west.

【Destroy your Rivals】
Resistance is futile – you will be assimilated! Machines are a constant thread to your hive. Serve and protect your alliance and fight back hostile drones. You can never trust the machines, but your rivals are even worse. They steal your raw materials, take over your steampunk factories and kill your loyal gunmen. Prepare now for the epic showdown of the wild west and eliminate them – before it is too late.

You play ‘Red Dead Redemption’ and love STEAMPUNK atmosphere?
This is the strategy game No.1 for you!
◈◈◈ DOWNLOAD now for free! ◈◈◈
